files.description: CLI runner that loads exemplar URLs from case-study JSON files, checks them (status/redirects), and writes runtime/outputs/qa/linkcheck_report.json and runtime/outputs/qa/LINKCHECK_SUMMARY.md.

missionDescription: Implement a link-check runner that reads exemplar URLs from case-study JSON and writes results to `runtime/outputs/qa/linkcheck_report.json` (status codes, redirects, last-checked timestamp) and a human-readable summary `runtime/outputs/qa/LINKCHECK_SUMMARY.md`.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Adds automated integrity checks for exemplar URLs (reachability + timestamps), reducing silent decay and ensuring the media catalog/case studies remain verifiable without downloading copyrighted mater...
